description: This file defines dependencies for a FastAPI application, including database session management and user authentication via token decoding. It imports modules from FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and internal project modules to facilitate dependency injection and authorization handling.

methods.name: Generator[Session,None,None] db_session()
methods.description: Provides a generator that yields a SQLAlchemy database session for request processing.

methods.name: dict get_current_user(authorization: str | None = Header(default=None), db: Session = Depends(db_session))
methods.description: Extracts and validates the current user from the Authorization header, decoding the token and returning user claims.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.pattern: /^def get_current_user(authorization: str | None = Header(default=None), db: Session = Depends(db_/
ctags.signature: (authorization: str | None = Header(default=None), db: Session = Depends(db_session))
